name: Mop of the Dead
description:
In Mop of the Dead, you must explore the dark corridors of your cleaning competitors office to steal their household products. However, there's a catch - you're being chased by a neat freak janitor. You must collect all 10 products and escape as quickly as possible.

Each game is randomized with collectable items hidden in different spots. As you progress, the janitor becomes relentless and runs faster.
You must work together to find keys, heal each other with medkits, and make smart decisions to get all the cleaning products. If you fail, you'll get swept away!

MOP OF THE DEAD OFFERS:


  • A magnificent mop
    The best mop you will ever see a little too close
  • Up to 4 players online co-op
    Play together with your friends or struggle alone
  • 3 Difficulty Modes
    Normal, Hard & Nightmare
  • Proximity Voice Chat
    We hope your friends have a good mic and doesn’t shout too much
  • Replayability
    Cleaning products, keys and medkits spawn in different positions
  • Gain Experience
    Unlock new characters by leveling up
  • Immersive Audio
    The worst ASMR you’ll ever hear for the best jumpscares

You'll never see your mop the same way again! (If you have one, dirty geek!)
